function.name: ExpensiveInstantRayCast
function.signature: bool ExpensiveInstantRayCast(Vector a, Vector b, handle c)
function.DescriptionEN: Do an instant (i.e. blocking) Ray Cast. Will do a handle/queue version later. Don't plan to use this for real!
function.DescriptionCN: 进行一个立即（即阻挡）的光线投射，稍后会有handle/queue版本，并不计划实际使用这个！

HowToCall.Parameter: Vector a, Vector b, handle c
